p: Essential oils of caraway seeds ( Carum Carvi L.), clove flower buds ( Eugenia carypylata L.), stems and leaves of sweet wormwood ( Artemisa annua L.) and spearmint leaves ( Mentha spicata L.) were extracted separately from 200 g samples. Extraction was done through a hydro-distillation procedure of the plant materials for 3 h using a Clevenger apparatus [ 18]. The extracted pure essential oils were stored at 4 Â°C in clean amber dark glass bottles until used.
